description: GPR174 knockout alleviates DSS-induced colitis by regulating immune function.
GPR174 knockout led to decreased expression of the pro-inflammatory cytokine IL-6.
GPR174 knockout resulted in increased expression of the anti-inflammatory cytokine IL-10.
GPR174 knockout was associated with reduced levels of pro-inflammatory cytokine TNF-α.
GPR174 affects the expression of MHC-II in dendritic cells.
